name: Ahsoka AR Quest 2
description:
Just trying to learn how to use the Passthrough on the Quest 2, and getting ready for May the 4th. 

Sideload the APK on your Quest 2. Enable Passthrough for the really cool stuff. Otherwise you can check it out with Ahsoka being in VR with a black background. 

There isn't a lot to it, but I think it turned out pretty cool. If there is enough demand, and if I don't somehow get it taken down by the House of Mouse, I might try to do an Ahsoka and Luke scene where they discuss Anakin.
